reviewDetails.comment: She always takes her time to listen to the patient and explains everything well. I’m always comfortable to talk to her!

I found my experience with Dr Chu troubling. There was no attempt to build rapport on our first meeting, nor an apology for being late. I was questioned when I asked for a specific treatment plan & told it wouldn’t work. Oddly, instead of prescribing medicine that would work, Dr Chu gave me the meds which I find to be lazy medicine. Why not prescribe a real solution? Her staff treated me disrespectfully as well. Can’t recommend
Dr. Chu is terrific — smart, personable, and easy to talk to. She is very thorough and explains things well. I definitely recommend her!
Dr Chu is very professional. She is thorough and makes you feel at ease. I would highly recommend her

Dr Chu was polite, friendly and efficient. 
I recommend!

schools.name: Rosalind Franklin U Of Med & Science, Chicago Med

reviewDetails.comment: Punctual, professional, and good doctor... I’m happy with my decision and will be loyal to this doctor.
Impatient, unfriendly, kept cutting me off. Just a very unpleasant experience all around. He spent maybe 5 minutes with me. The PA was kind and apologized for his behavior after he left the room.

This dermatology office needs a full revamp. They are unorganized and don’t follow through on what they say they will. Video tele-health session was not communicated well. At time of appointment doctor never came to video platform, instead he just called. He never emailed the follow up he promised. Also you can’t call the office directly to speak to anyone. You go through a call service and the doctor/ office are terrible at returning calls. Do not go to this office.
Doctor and staff push a specialty pharmacy on their patients and make it very difficult to have prescriptions sent to their own home pharmacy.
I had two issues and he literally said “I’m not sure what to do” about both. Not a good feeling when your doctor isn’t confident...
No, He didn't give a answer to my problem because he didn't know and he didn't perform any test.
He is incredible! I have been going to him for 5 years.

reviewDetails.comment: Has been my dermatologist for years and is very professional and caring
Friendly, professional, knowledgeable.  Helped find less expensive prescription.  Wait was long.
She is professional. Providing her service out of limit of her responsibilities. Courteous. Very knowledgeable with great professional attitude and high standards of medical service.
Very good.

reviewDetails.comment: Friendly, professional, remembered my situation after a full year!
My last visit (for a nuclear stress test) was not with Dr Amin, but he has always been professional and in touch with any results or issues.
Dr Amin is a wonderful and approachable doctor in addition to being a wealth of practical and technical knowledge. I highly recommend him.
Yes, love Dr. Amin. He's a great cardiologist. He will answer any questions you have and is good at his job. I never feel rushed when I am talking with him and he values my time.

I have never been to a cardiologist before so I cannot compare this experience to previous ones but I didn't leave feeling great about my care or about the next steps/my future with the issues I've been facing. It was clear that he or the resident (who was not specializing in cardiology) was not concerned by my symptoms but they did not put me at ease or help me understand why I may be experiencing them and what I could potentially do to feel better. It felt like a really speedy appointment lacking in genuine concern for why I was in the office which has made me look for a second opinion.
He listened to my questions, answered clearly, and did not make me come in a second time to review lab results. His nursing team was also great.

reviewDetails.comment: He couldn't figure out why my heart sped up to 190 BPM one day so he put me on an exit monitor, which caught another jump to 166 BPM randomly in the morning yet his still didn't know what that meant so he decided it was stress and sent me on my way without doin any more tests to figure out what the issue was. He said "come back if it happens again" as though I wasn't there in the first place because it's already happening. Save your time and your copay.
